title: Digital Content Management and Variable Data Publishing
description: Digital content management for print, web, and personalized communication. File management, database principles, archiving, document formats, variable data publishing, groupware, and repurposing content. Technical and creative problem-solving for content management in print and web publishing. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: GRC 202, GRC 203 and GRC 218; Graphic Communication majors only
